ci_image = np.array([[np.sqrt(1.0), np.sqrt(2.0)], [np.sqrt(3.0), np.sqrt(
    4.0)]])
ci_noise_map = 1.0 * np.ones((2, 2))
ci_pattern = MockPattern(regions=[ci_frame.Region(region=[0, 1, 0, 1])])
ci_pre_cti = MockCIPreCTI(frame_geometry=MockGeometry(), ci_pattern=
    ci_pattern, array=0.0 * np.ones((2, 2)), value=0.0)
ci_mask = np.ma.zeros((2, 2))
return MockCIDataFit(ci_frame=MockCIFrame(value=0.0), ci_pattern=ci_pattern,
    image=ci_image, noise_map=ci_noise_map, ci_pre_cti=ci_pre_cti, mask=ci_mask
    )
